setEffects.4: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

flower.name: Berserker's Rose
flower.desc: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

plume.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
plume.desc: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

sands.name: Berserker's Timepiece
sands.desc: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left â€” both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

goblet.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
goblet.desc: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

circlet.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
circlet.desc: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.
